references: Related: Ord 20140, Ord 19605, Ord 20148, Ord 19606, Ord 18631
summary: An Ordinance authorizing the City Comptroller to incur an additional expenditure in the sum of Two hundred (200) dollars, or so much thereof as may be necessary, for the month of February, 1909, in advertising for sale various bond issues and in the preparation of transcript of record in connection therewith.
